definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Xiao1 fei4 zhe3 Xie2 hui4

sentences.english: What will the euro beggarly for customers?
sentences.chinese: 歐元對消費者意味着什麼？

sentences.english: Mypricemap is a smart shopping tool for all shoppers.
sentences.chinese: 比翻天是一個讓消費者聰明購物的工具。

sentences.english: Those who have gone back to non-industrialized sections of the country will not be net consumers at all.
sentences.chinese: 那些回到農村的人將不再是淨消費者。

sentences.english: A relatively high exposure to the U.S. consumer.
sentences.chinese: 在美國消費者中相對高的曝光度。

sentences.english: Skyscrapers are also lavish consumers, and wasters, of electirc power.
sentences.chinese: 摩天大樓還是電能的過度消費者與浪費者。

sentences.english: Quality is the consumer product or service satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 質量是指消費者對產品或服務滿意的程度。

sentences.english: The con man has used my name card to cheat people and customers.
sentences.chinese: 這個騙徒拿我的名片欺騙大衆和消費者。

sentences.english: A recent study aimed to evaluate how consumers understand the concept of minerality.
sentences.chinese: 最近一項研究就試圖探明消費者對這一概念的理解。

sentences.english: In Vietnam, consumers are rethinking what to buy for the holiday known locally as Tet.
sentences.chinese: 在越南，消費者們正在重新思考該買些什麼過節。

sentences.english: The results of the BCA consumer research project also will be presented.
sentences.chinese: 結果基本能力評估的消費者研究項目也將提交。

sentences.english: I fully expect that SIGG will not let consumers down inthe future.
sentences.chinese: 我十分期待未來SIGG不會再讓消費者失望了。

sentences.english: Many farm also actively explore some personalized service to appeal to consumers.
sentences.chinese: 不少農家樂還積極開拓一些個性化服務吸引消費者。

sentences.english: The site isdesigned to provide consumers with practical information on healthful eating.
sentences.chinese: 該網站旨在爲消費者提供有關健康飲食的實用信息。

sentences.english: The Producer-Consumer rule can be enforced at the server level.
sentences.chinese: 在服務層實施的是生產者消費者規則。

sentences.english: So much of that depends on the consumer.
sentences.chinese: 這在很大程度上依賴於消費者。

sentences.english: Finally, an AD can bring unlimited business opportunities for the night and a large consumer.
sentences.chinese: 最後，廣告可以爲起夜帶來無限商機和年夜量消費者。

definition: dealer/trader/person engaged in some industry or trade
